events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your qualifications promptly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering as you mentioned relevant experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your application and were impressed with your software development skills.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability to proceed to the next steps in the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
